question: [Review] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.

qas.question: [Review] Deutsch: Teile which category has the highest bar aus dem Balkendiagramm mit.
[Focus] Espanol: Indica which category has the lowest bar del grafico de barras.
[Detailed] English: Tell what is the difference between the tallest and shortest bars from the bar chart.
